code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{GlobalContext}from"../context/GlobalState";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var IncomeExpenses=function IncomeExpenses(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var income=amounts.filter(function(item){return item>0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0).toFixed(2);var expense=amounts.filter(function(item){return item<0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0)*-1 .toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inc-exp-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"money plus",children:income})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Expense"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"money minus",children:Math.abs(expense)})]})]});};export default IncomeExpenses;
